import { CheckboxImage } from "/src/components/Images";

# Checkbox
Checkboxes allow user to select one or more items from a set, can be used to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'space-evenly', backgroundColor: '#F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <CheckboxImage width={'50%'}/>
</div>

### Selected
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.CheckBoxAV
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:checked="true"/>
```

<br/><br/>

### Unselected
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.CheckBoxAV
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>
```

<br/><br/>

### Selected Disable
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.CheckBoxAV
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:enabled="false"
        android:checked="true/">
```

<br/><br/>

### Unselected Disable
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.CheckBoxAV
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:enabled="false"/>
```

<br/><br/>

### Indeterminate
```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.IndeterminateCheckBoxAV
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:enabled="false"/>
```
